SEARCH
Package edu.ncsu.csc216.app_manager.model.application

Class Application

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.app_manager.model.application.Application
public class Application extends Object
Represents an application managed in the system with state transitions.

  • Constructor Details

    • Application

      public Application(int id, Application.AppType appType, String summary, String note)
      Constructor to create a new Application.
      Parameters:
      id - Application ID.
      appType -
      summary - Summary of the application.
      note - Initial note for the application.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if parameters are invalid.

    • Application

      public Application(int id, String state, String appType, String summary, String reviewer, boolean processPaperwork, String resolution, ArrayList<String> notes)
      Constructor to create an Application with specific parameters, typically used when loading from a file.
      Parameters:
      id - Application ID.
      state - The name of the initial state.
      appType - The type of application (New, Old, Hired).
      summary - The summary of the application.
      reviewer - The reviewer ID.
      processPaperwork - Whether the paperwork has been processed.
      resolution - The resolution of the application.
      notes - The notes associated with the application.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameters are invalid.

  • Method Details

    • setState

      public void setState(String state)
      Sets the current state of the application based on the state name.
      Parameters:
      state - The name of the state.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the state name is invalid.

    • update

      public void update(Command command)
      Updates the state of the application based on the given command.
      Parameters:
      command - The command to process.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if the command is invalid for the current state.

    • addNote
